chapter.title: Configuration
chapter.para: Activiti configuration files should be generated with the setup ant script. The cfg.create target can be easily configured in the setup/build.properties and the setup/build.${db}.properties. Our QA runs only the configurations that are generatable by the setup script. We also do not guarantee compatbility of the actual configuration files in future versions as you will always be able to regenerate it. So customizing the configuration files is not recommended.
